member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Dash.BaseUrlExclusionList
member.summary: Holds the state of #exclude(BaseUrl, long) excluded base URLs to be used to #selectBaseUrl(List) select a base URL based on these exclusions.

member.summary: Creates an instance.

member.param: The base URL to exclude.
The duration of exclusion, in milliseconds.
member.summary: Excludes the given base URL.

member.param: The list of base URLs.
member.summary: Returns the number of priority levels of the given list of base URLs.
member.returns: The number of priority levels before exclusion.

member.param: The list of base URLs.
member.summary: Returns the number of priority levels for the given list of base URLs after exclusion.
member.returns: The number of priority levels after exclusion.

member.summary: Resets the state.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Dash.BaseUrlExclusionList.SelectBaseUrl(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Dash.Manifest.BaseUrl})

member.summary: Selects the base URL to use from the given list.
member.returns: The selected base URL after exclusion or null if all elements have been excluded.
